comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
William Jennings Bryan delivered an oration from the same porch on April 20, 1912, early in that year's campaign for the Democratic Party nomination for President. (Woodrow Wilson, the winner that year, later appointed Bryan Secretary of State.)
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2515741737/]
A Bain/LOC photo dated May 1, 1914, was posted to Flickr on April 27, 2011:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5669473837/in/photostream]
